title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.21 - Attendance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.21 - Attendance

State Regulations

In order to obtain a certificate of completion for continuing
education appraisers must attend 100 percent of the required instruction
time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1107.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
